title: Stephen King - On Writing (Audiobook)
description:
For all you future writers there's a treasure chest of insights, advice and inside opinion of (arguably) one of the most influential contemporary writers, Stephen King.

For those who don't know this (audio-)book, here he walks the line between (awefully honest) autobiography and mentioned advice for aspiring authors. King goes from his childhood and early journalist days to his college times and stunning breakthrough, to the book's present (2004) with King recovering from a car accident and near death experience.

I won't give away any of his writing advice, because he will explain it MUCH better than I ever could, so if you're interested, go ahead and download.

Don't forget to seed, please!

Enjoy!
